ai_description: A roll of pink and white patterned cleaning cloths packaged in a clear wrapper with a colorful label. The cloths feature a repeating wavy pink line pattern on a white non-woven fabric background. The roll is wound around a brown cardboard core, with individual cloths measuring 35cm by 25cm. The packaging shows the OKS branding and highlights the roll-type format for easy use. In lifestyle shots, the textured cloth is shown being used in kitchen and bathroom settings.
